option.value: -Xmx512m -Xms256m -XX:MaxPermSize=250m -ea

task.summary: Base commit. Added recyclerview to show the list of registered genres and created the base layout for each of the encolsed items. Defined the base app theme
Base commit. Added recyclerview to show the list of registered genres and created the base layout for each of the encolsed items. Defined the base app theme
Added settings editor and applied changes that was missing when clearing the configurations. Created Utils class for constant, shared values
Updated click handling to enable a single item to be palying

Player no fetches tracks from the selected genre and plays the first one. Added task to request the tracks from a specific genre. Added listener to manage the player state. Added AppController to hold the future volley integration (for some reason volley was failing at making the request and managing the result - the answer was always empty). Added correspondant models for each of the involved objects (lookup responses and items)
Changed adapter behaviour when playing a track. Small tweaks
Improved track skipping behaviour, but still needs additional checks

Created service to manage the audio player. Finished integrating the play/pause and skip buttons. Switched to the MediaPlayer and removed exoPlayer for now as few documentation is available and poor performance for streaming audio. Updated interfaces between activity and fragments

Changed interface to hold the active actionbar. Changed theme to hide default toolbar and include the custom layout with the new one. added listener to respond to scroll changes and hide buttons and toolbar accordingly. Removed useless main fragment and merged its behaviour with the main activity
Added artists to each of the genres. These are laded each time a song starts playing. Added threshold to avoid a flood of requests if the user presses the skip button very often.
Fixed genre items not being correctly saved and loaded

MESSAGE.value: Base commit. Added recyclerview to show the list of registered genres and created the base layout for each of the encolsed items. Defined the base app theme
Added settings editor and applied changes that was missing when clearing the configurations. Created Utils class for constant, shared values
Updated click handling to enable a single item to be palying

Player no fetches tracks from the selected genre and plays the first one. Added task to request the tracks from a specific genre. Added listener to manage the player state. Added AppController to hold the future volley integration (for some reason volley was failing at making the request and managing the result - the answer was always empty). Added correspondant models for each of the involved objects (lookup responses and items)
Changed adapter behaviour when playing a track. Small tweaks
Improved track skipping behaviour, but still needs additional checks

Created service to manage the audio player. Finished integrating the play/pause and skip buttons. Switched to the MediaPlayer and removed exoPlayer for now as few documentation is available and poor performance for streaming audio. Updated interfaces between activity and fragments

Changed interface to hold the active actionbar. Changed theme to hide default toolbar and include the custom layout with the new one. added listener to respond to scroll changes and hide buttons and toolbar accordingly. Removed useless main fragment and merged its behaviour with the main activity
Added artists to each of the genres. These are laded each time a song starts playing. Added threshold to avoid a flood of requests if the user presses the skip button very often.
Fixed genre items not being correctly saved and loaded

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Fixed genre items not being correctly saved and loaded
